item.title: Dumped mattress on the pavement, 27th January
item.description:

item.title: Dog pooh being left all over shared garden, 27th January
item.description:
A man is walking his dog off lead through a residents shared garden/ footpath around Westbrook Court flats. The dog is leaving large piles of pooh all over the shared garden area, outside peoplesâ€™ flats, on the pathways around the flats. He is doing this at least twice a day and the garden/ pathways are covered in piles of dog faeces

item.title: This pedestrian light takes too long, 27th January
item.description:

item.title: Pavement dips and is flooded every time it rains, 27th January
item.description:
Pavement and road are flooded every time it rains. Cars swerve to go past or shower pedestrians - often small children - with dirty water. This has been ongoing for years and never fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, Greater London
